text: Southern Rhodesia competed as Rhodesia at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Tokyo, Japan. 29 competitors, 25 men and 4 women, took part in 15 events in 7 sports. It was the last of three appearances at the Summer Olympics by a Rhodesian representation; Zimbabwe would make its first appearance at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==Athletics== ==Boxing== ==Diving== ==Field hockey== Men's Roster *John McPhun ==Hockey== ==Sailing== ==Shooting== Two shooters represented Rhodesia in 1964. ;Trap * Johannes Lamprecht * John Richards ==Swimming== ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1964 Summer Olympics 1964 Category:1964 in Southern Rhodesia 1964
title: Rhodesia at the 1964 Summer Olympics
